note:
Liz Henwood, a hippy, Humanist, lefty, music loving lass who adores nature, crochets cute things, plays/makes video games, adores sci-fi and wishes everyone could just be nice & considerate to each other.

Keeper of mice, lap for a cat.

Former secondary school science teacher and biology graduate.

Hypermobile, mobility scooter driver, stick/rollator user, accessibility advocate.
